response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's a perfect match. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is an opportunity to secure an asset valued at $1,500,000 for a substantial discount, allowing you to benefit greatly from its unique features and capabilities. We understand that decisions like these require careful consideration, so please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
